EXT_NAME.message: Stay Awake - Keep your system awake

EXT_DESCRIPTION.message: Keep your system and display awake whenever you need it or during long downloads.

ONBOARDING_STEP_1.message: Click the icon in the extension tray to access the extension popup.

ONBOARDING_STEP_2.message: Click the Activate button or use the shortcut at any time to keep your system awake.

ONBOARDING_STEP_3.message: Enable "Activate while downloading files" to automatically activate Stay Awake while files are downloading.

ONBOARDING_DONATE.message: Gifts are entirely optional but they do help me to continue creating free extensions. Thanks for your generosity!
